channel.title: How to understand the npcdrops in battlescape?

item.title: How to understand the npcdrops in battlescape?
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

The only way I could think of doing it that would be easy for you would be to create an additional array with the % chance of getting the drop - until then, just fill the array with more common drops than rare ones.

Read full topic
item.source: How to understand the npcdrops in battlescape?

item.title: How to understand the npcdrops in battlescape?
item.dc:creator: @Made_4_U Made 4 U
item.description:
@Made_4_U wrote:

How do you alter the odds of getting a drop rather than having a list of drops. heres a sample of what the npc drops looklike
public static int Tyra[] = {1050,1311,1365,1353,1197,1073,1163,1065,1099,1135,560,562,554,2357,1734,361,1607,1601,251,249,259,3001};

public static int RandomTyra() {
	return Tyra[(int)(Math.random()*Tyra.length)];
}

Read full topic
item.source: How to understand the npcdrops in battlescape?
